text: Dhaka Medical College and Hospital is a public medical college and hospital in Dhaka, Bangladesh. It is one of the most renowned public medical colleges and hospitals in Bangladesh. It is the largest public medical college and hospital in Bangladesh. DMCH stands among the top 20 hospitals in the world by considering its size and the number of patients being treated here. The college was established on 10 July 1946. The campus has both a medical school and a high-level care hospital within the premises. == References == Category:Hospitals Category:Colleges and universities in Dhaka
title: Dhaka Medical College and Hospital
